data.text: @JaniceDean @msabedi @davechokshi @DrMaryTBassett @errollouis She should be critical of  failures Cuomo &his puppet Dr Zucker
@msabedi @davechokshi @DrMaryTBassett @errollouis Why doesn’t @DrMaryTBassett want to investigate why over 9,000 Covid-19 patients were shoved into nursing homes in March of 2020.

@msabedi @NY1 @davechokshi @DrMaryTBassett @errollouis I wonder what Dr. Chokshi has to say about the 9 pages of adverse effects recently released by Pfizer. You are a news outlet, so why not  ask him? Don't let him evade the question. Thank you.

@msabedi @davechokshi @DrMaryTBassett @errollouis “Dr. Mary Bassett showed “complete disregard” towards families of nursing home COVID-19 victim’s families when she said she “won’t unravel” mistakes made under ex-Gov. Andrew Cuomo that led to the deaths of over 15,000.” https://t.co/xZyMwQFgoN
@msabedi @davechokshi @DrMaryTBassett @errollouis Ask them both why they think it’s a good idea to mask toddlers.
@msabedi @davechokshi @DrMaryTBassett @errollouis Why doesn’t @DrMaryTBassett want to find out about the preventable deaths of over 15,000 seniors in nursing homes in the spring of 2020?
@msabedi @errollouis @davechokshi @DrMaryTBassett Will thee be any apologies or admission of error?!
